amendment.description: An amendment numbered 52 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to prohibit implementation of the April 6, 2023 proposed revisions to OMB Circular A-4 to minimize projected costs and maximize projected benefits of new regulations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.
